docs.snippet: Ghana attacked brightly in a 2-2 draw with Germany, but it will have to deal with the suspension of two star players. Injury-riddled Portugal is increasingly relying on the magic of Cristiano Ronaldo, who is still nursing a knee injury of his own.
docs.abstract: Ghana attacked brightly in a 2-2 draw with Germany, but it will have to deal with the suspension of two star players. Injury-riddled Portugal is increasingly relying on the magic of Cristiano Ronaldo, who is still nursing a knee injury of his own.

headline.main: Ghana vs. Portugal: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Uruguay will decide in coming hours whether to appeal a record nine-match ban on star striker Luis Suarez by FIFA for biting an Italy defender during a group match, local media reported on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay will decide in coming hours whether to appeal a record nine-match ban on star striker Luis Suarez by FIFA for biting an Italy defender during a group match, local media reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Uruguay to Decide on Suarez Appeal in Coming Hours-Media
headline.print_headline: Uruguay to Decide on Suarez Appeal in Coming Hours-Media

docs.snippet: Colombia was already without Radamel Falcao. Now Uruguay is without Luis Suarez.

docs.snippet: Uruguay will appeal against FIFA's nine-match ban imposed on striker Luis Suarez for biting an Italy defender in a World Cup group match, Uruguay's FA president said on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay will appeal against FIFA's nine-match ban imposed on striker Luis Suarez for biting an Italy defender in a World Cup group match, Uruguay's FA president said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Soccer-crazy Uruguayans raged Thursday at FIFA's decision to kick their star player out of the World Cup for his third biting incident, fearing it could deal a death blow to their bid to win the sport's greatest tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer-crazy Uruguayans raged Thursday at FIFA's decision to kick their star player out of the World Cup for his third biting incident, fearing it could deal a death blow to their bid to win the sport's greatest tournament.

headline.main: Uruguay Rages Against Suarez Soccer Ban for Biting
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Rages Against Suarez Soccer Ban for Biting

docs.snippet: Adidas stopped short on Thursday of ending its sponsorship deal with Uruguay's Luis Suarez after FIFA banned him for nine matches for biting an Italy defender, but the German sportswear firm said it would not use him in any further World Cup...
docs.lead_paragraph: Adidas stopped short on Thursday of ending its sponsorship deal with Uruguay's Luis Suarez after FIFA banned him for nine matches for biting an Italy defender, but the German sportswear firm said it would not use him in any further World Cup marketing.

headline.main: Adidas Not Ditching Suarez but Will Not Use for More World Cup Marketing
headline.print_headline: Adidas Not Ditching Suarez but Will Not Use for More World Cup Marketing

docs.snippet: A record ban and a fine for Uruguay striker Luis Suarez.  Sonia Legg looks at the financial impact of FIFA's action on one of soccer's top earners.

docs.snippet: Striker Luis Suarez will fly home to Uruguay later on Thursday having been hit with the biggest ban imposed at a World Cup after biting an Italy defender, the Uruguay FA told local media.
docs.lead_paragraph: Striker Luis Suarez will fly home to Uruguay later on Thursday having been hit with the biggest ban imposed at a World Cup after biting an Italy defender, the Uruguay FA told local media.

headline.main: Banned Suarez Leaving Brazil, Flying to Uruguay Thursday
